welcome_message_body: Welcome to Krugersdorp, where old-world charm meets modern excitement! Explore our historic mining town, nestled in the beautiful Cradle of Humankind, and enjoy the natural beauty and unique experiences this vibrant city has to offer.

restaurants.name: The Diner
restaurants.description: The Diner is a diner located in Krugersdorp.

restaurants.name: Wimpy
restaurants.description: Wimpy is a burger joint located in Krugersdorp.

restaurants.name: Ocean Basket
restaurants.description: Ocean Basket is a seafood restaurant located in Krugersdorp.

restaurants.name: The Verandah Bistro
restaurants.description: The Verandah Bistro is a restaurant located in Krugersdorp.

restaurants.name: Nando's
restaurants.description: Nando's is a portuguese restaurant located in Krugers dorp.
restaurants.address: Key west shopping centre, Krugers dorp

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pilanesberg Airport is a modern and spacious facility, offering a range of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Domestic Terminal
terminals.description: The domestic terminal at Pilanesberg Airport serves flights within South Africa and is equipped with all necessary facilities for a comfortable travel experience.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Pilanesberg Airport caters to flights from other countries and offers a variety of services to make international travel convenient.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi is available throughout the airport, simply connect to the network and follow the prompts to access the internet.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lanseria Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Lanseria Airport, used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

airports.airport_name: Oliver Reginald Tambo International (Jan Smuts International)

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main international terminal at Oliver Reginald Tambo International Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The secondary domestic terminal at Oliver Reginald Tambo International Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The regional terminal at Oliver Reginald Tambo International Airport.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi for up to 4 hours per day.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rand/Germiston Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Rand/Germiston Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
